#summary Physical RAM Map

see also: [[MemoryMap Newton OS 2.1 Physical Memory Map]]

The RAM will be mapped to various places in virtual memory using the MMU lookup table.

Physical Map:
|| `04000000` || 1st level MMU table (16kB) ||
|| `04004000` || End of 1st Level MMU Table ||
|| `043c0000`<br>`043fffff` || Physical Video RAM: 320x480/2=76800 bytes ||

Virtual Map:
|| `01b00000` || Jump Table (more details needed) ||
|| `0C100000` || System Variables (more details needed) ||
|| `60000000` || NewtonScript expanded (running) apps (unlikely! please verify!) ||
|| `E0000000` || Video RAM: 320x480/2=76800 bytes (please verify) ||
